resources.string: Write down mnemonic in paper,\n losing mnemonic means you lose your wallet
Enter a password with 8 to 16 characters
Mnemonic must be separated by a space
Password is used to protect private keys and transaction authorization. Please ensure you choose a strong password.
Elastos won\'t store your password and won\'t be able to retrieve it back. Please keep your password safe and secure.
Password does not meet requirement, please set a new one.
Backup wallet: please copy your "12 word mnemonic phrase" to a safe place and do not do save on the network.
Save the text to a safe place
Click transaction NO. to see all the details
Enter public key of your node (Required)
Enter website URL of your node (Required)
Wallet name is limited to 1-16 characters, Chinese or English
do you want to select the top 36?
Node Website URL musnt\' be empty
You are able to retrieve your deposit for supernode election 72 hours after cancellation
Are you confirming the cancellation? \n Once cancelled, all votes are cleared and unrecoverable.

When you participate in ELA supernode voting, the ELA in your wallet address are locked in a sense. Voting does not consume ELA other than a small voting transaction fee associated with each time you initiate a new voting transaction. Each vote can be cast to a maximum of 36 supernodes. If you cancel or change your votes, the actual result will take time to propagate.
Up to 36 supernodes can be selected for each vote, and there is a certain delay in revocation or change of the vote。
8–16 characters long and contains at least two letters, numbers, and special characters
(ERR_20042)Local tx do not belong to wallet
Need permission of memory and camera
Registration information has been submitted, please wait for transaction confirmation
Please click your mnemonic words in order
Creating new wallet or importing an existing wallet using keystore is recommended for quick synchronization
No data available, please be patient!
ELA Wallet is a secure and trusted Elastos Light Node (SPV).
The number of UTXO is %1$s, consolidate?
The private key cannot be empty

Sign the transaction with a wallet containing the private key

Add to Candidate List in Batches
Quitting from the CR Election?\nAfter quitting, votes are permanently cleared.
The deposit is not available for withdrawal for 72 hours after quitting

DID(consistent with the master management public key)

Note: All fields on this page are non-mandatory. Content is saved locally and can only be shared by user authorization.

Do you use the last draft?
Does not support multi-signed wallet to participate in voting
Please enter the main chain withdrawal address
Please create a password with 8 to 12 characters

The CR Council Member Election is open to the entire Elastos community, and all community members can participate in the construction of the Elastos Smartweb. By participating in the election, candidate nodes (run by either individuals or teams) effectively demonstrate a complete understanding of and take on a commitment to comply with all contents of the following agreement: 
1. Before participating in the election, the participants have read and fully understand and agree with the content of the CRC white paper and the election rules pertaining to CR council members. 
2. While participating in CR Consensus, all candidate nodes should: abide by the laws and regulations of the country or region in which they are located; ensure the content they publish, forward, or provide conforms to relevant legislation, regulations, and social morality of the country or region in which they are located; and respect the relevant legislation, regulations, and social morality of the country or region in which other members are located. 
3. While participating in CR Consensus, the content published by candidate nodes in any channel only represents the positions and opinions of its owners. All candidate nodes shall be responsible for the content and topics that they publish, and the candidate nodes shall bear all legal responsibility and related joint liability for all disputes arising from such published content. Additionally, the candidate nodes shall not damage or infringe upon the rights and interests of the Elastos community, team, or community members. 
4. All candidate nodes fully understand and recognize that Elastos is an open source project, and shall also comply with the following provisions: CR partners (at present, the Gelaxy Team, but remaining subject to CR entrustment) has the right to update or optimize code according to the CRC white paper when loopholes, hacking-related exploits, or other sub-optimal conditions that impair CRC operations, are exposed. , For any impact caused by the corresponding adjustment, update, or optimization of the open source code, all candidate nodes unconditionally waive any legal responsibility for CR partners or commissioned teams. 
5. All candidate nodes shall comply with the conditions of CR member elections, CR operations, and related penalty mechanisms. The consequences of triggering the penalty mechanism shall be borne by all candidate nodes. 
6. All candidate nodes shall fully understand and recognize that the private key of their respective wallets during the election is the only certificate for the candidate nodes to exercise their rights and obligations. The candidate nodes shall not share their private keys with others for use in any way, including but not limited to not providing the private key to others for use in any way by transferring, renting, or borrowing. Otherwise, any consequences and joint liabilities arising from these actions shall be borne by the candidate nodes themselves.
Council member nickname has been created
I have read and agreed with the above provisions
The DID function cannot be used if the DID Sidechain is closed. Do you still want to proceed?
Previous vote is invalid due to insufficient balance. Continue?
Transaction error. Unable to publish on-chain
Your %1$s votes have expired due to insufficient transaction amount
Apply for your DID information (Including but not limited to storage, display, etc.)：
No DID created in this wallet

Main functions： 
· Intra-ecosystem digital asset support 
· Elastos DID authentication 
· Elastos DPoS Supernode elections 
· CR council elections 
· CR Suggestion & Proposal processes
Enter Proposal number, Proposal name, or Proposer
Votes required to reject a Proposal
Impeachment request sent successfully. You will receive a transaction confirmation shortly.

Each Council member should run a DPoS Supernode elected by default and ensure that his or her Supernode works properly. Each Council member will also receive all profits generated by his or her Supernode

The term of CR Council members has expired, and all council members will automatically resign from office. Based on your actual performance and the operation of your CRC node, your deposit refund is %1$sELA.
The term of CR Council members has expired, and all council members will automatically resign from office.
Since the impeachment against you has been passed, you have been removed from office. Based on your actual performance and the operation of your CRC node, your deposit refund is %1$sELA.
Since the impeachment against you has been passed, you have been removed from office.

The last CR Council has been disbanded, and all council members will automatically resign from office. Based on your actual performance and the operation of your CRC node, your deposit refund is %1$sELA.
The last CR Council has been disbanded, and all council members will automatically resign from office.
Request to use your DID information (including but not limited to storage, display, etc.:
This election is over. Unfortunately, you have not been elected this time. Thank you for your participation
Do you want to clear and resynchronize the data?
Ela Wallet open source code program statement

1. This program is an open source code App that provides corresponding derivative functions based on the base code of the open source project Elastos, and follows the open source MIT agreement. 

2. The use of this program shall be deemed to be fully understood, and capable of bearing any relevant risks - technical and otherwise -that may exist. 

3. Due to the nature of the distributed node network, the development team is not responsible for the risks and consequences caused by any situation in which node services cannot be accessed due to poor network conditions or communication lines, code security defects, or any hacking or regulatory requirements originating in the country or region where the distributed network node is located.
